channel.title: podman on MicroShift.io
channel.description: Recent content in podman on MicroShift.io

item.title: Deploying MicroShift
item.description: MicroShift can be deployed as a systemd service either containerized or from an RPM

item.title: MicroShift Containerized
item.description: Deploy MicroShift from a Linux container and run as a systemd service.

item.title: Private Registries and Pull Secrets
item.description: MicroShift may need access to a private registry. Access can be granted from registry login or from a pull-secret.
